name: Cube Airport - Puzzle
description:
Immerse yourself in a memorable experience with a relaxing LoFi soundtrack and unique visuals that will leave you extremely satisfied.


You are responsible for constructing the runway for the airplane to take off. To do this, fit the runway cubes correctly into the indicated positions on the platform.


- 40 levels;
- Original soundtrack;
- Satisfying puzzles;
- Low poly visuals;
- Play with the mouse.
